rules_text:
Enchant creature
When Comeuppance enters the battlefield, suppress enchanted creature until Comeuppance leaves the battlefield. [i](A suppressed permanent loses all abilities and can't have or gain abilities.)[/i]
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
notes: fluffy: couldn't this just be "enchanted creature loses all abilities and can't have or gain abilities"? kind of janky to have it be like this imo
